Class GraphsResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polito.nffg.neo4j.resources.GraphsResource

  • @Path(value="/graphs")
public class GraphsResource
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the methods that are mapped to HTTP request at path '/graphs'.
    See Also:
    @Path

      • getGraphs

        @GET
@Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
public NffgSet getGraphs()
                  throws MyGenericException
        Method associated with HTTP GET. It's used to retrieve all graphs.
        Returns:
        the retrieved graphs.
        Throws:
        MyNotFoundException - if there are no available graphs.
        MyGenericException - in case of any other unpredictable errors.
        See Also:
        NffgSet, @GET, @Produces, MyNotFoundException, MyGenericException

      • createGraph

        @POST
@Consumes(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createGraph(Nffg graph)
                                      throws MyGenericException
        Method associated with HTTP POST. It's used to create a graph.
        Parameters:
        graph - the given graph.
        Returns:
        a response that contains ah HttpMessage object and the URL location.
        Throws:
        MyConstraintViolationException - if a validation error occurs during the process.
        MyGenericException - in case of any other unpredictable errors.
        See Also:
        Response, @POST, @Consumes, Graph, Nffg, HttpMessage, MyConstraintViolationException, MyGenericException

      • getGraph

        @Path(value="{ graphId: [0-9]+ }")
public GraphResource getGraph(@PathParam(value="graphId")
                          java.lang.String id)
        Creates an instance of GraphResource class for manage HTTP request at path '/graphs/graphId'
        Parameters:
        id - the graphId taken directly from URL.
        Returns:
        the created instance of GraphResource class.
        See Also:
        @Path, GraphResource, @PathParam, String
